programme.desc: No passado, uma feio geolgica nas profundezas da gua despertou uma pira que estava extinta h milhes de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terrveis animais invadem um parque aqutico no meio da temporada de vero.

programme.title: Terremoto, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando uma srie de terremotos comea a destruir Los Angeles, Emily e Jason correm pelas runas da cidade na esperana de desviar o epicentro para salvar milhes de vidas.

programme.title: Antes S Do Que Mal Acompanhado, (1987, Comedy)
programme.desc: Neal s que voltar para Chicago e passar o Dia de Ao de Graas com sua famlia. Mas ele s se d mal. Tudo culpa de Del Griffith um vendedor desbocado que leva Neal a uma busca sem sentido.

programme.title: Um Pobreto na Casa Branca, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Quando Washington precisa desesperadamente de um candidato presidncia semanas antes da eleio, no h tempo a perder. Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), um poltico desconhecido de um pequeno bairro de D.C., escolhido para ser a marionete do governo.

programme.title: Os Intocveis, (1987, Drama)
programme.desc: Este confronto clssico entre o bem e o mal estrelado por Kevin Costner , Robert De Niro e Sean Connery , o policial que ensina Ness a vencer a multido: atirar rpido e atirar primeiro.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: Intruder A-6 - Um Vo para o Inferno, (1991, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Durante a guerra de avies sobre o Vietn, um avio bombardeiro dos EUA, Intruder A-6, pretende fazer um ataque areo no autorizado sobre Hanoi.

programme.title: Assassino Virtual, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Quando uma simulao de realidade virtual criada com as personalidades de vrios serial killers consegue escapar para o mundo real, um ex-policial tem a misso de deter seu reinado de terror.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Demi Moore e Woody Harrelson so Diana e David Murphy, um casal com problemas financeiros que esto apostando numa viagem rpida a Las Vegas para conseguir uma boa mo no jogo de cartas.

programme.title: Mariya O Simbolo de Uma Guerra, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: Um emocionante drama de guerra que conta a histria de Maria Petrova, em cujo destino, como em um espelho, o destino do pas se refletiu: a filha de um padre, que renunciou ao pai e f, ela serve no NKVD.

programme.title: Epiphany Amor e Perdo, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem luta para criar um relacionamento com o pai aps a morte da tia que a criou

programme.title: Chuteira de Ouro, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Com o pai soldado desaparecido durante misso e a me devotada lutando por sua vida aps um acidente de carro devastador, o jovem Christian deve superar as circunstncias para permanecer focado em seu sonho de se tornar um jogador de futebol famoso.

programme.title: A Felicidade Mora ao Lado, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Pouco antes do Natal, aps sair da cadeia, Jon Price, um presidirio em liberdade condicional, se v obrigado a voltar para sua pequena e chuvosa cidade natal e reencontrar sua famlia.

programme.title: F. Esperana. Amor., (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Seis estudantes encontram-se reunidos para um fim-de-semana. Estes seis estranhos descobrem que um dilogo sobre amor, relaes, f, lutas e conflitos passados os leva a descobrir quem realmente so, e no que realmente acreditam.

programme.title: Madre Teresa, (2003, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Do incio do seu ministrio at a sua morte. A vida de Madre Teresa (Olivia Hussey) que sempre serviu aos pobres.

programme.title: Stan foge de casa e vai Nebraska. Os rapazes querem ver o senhor Hanckey na noite de Natal. E o tio de Cartman e Charles Manson escapam da priso e se escondem no poro dos Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os rapazes so obrigados a escreverem textos sobre pequenas empresas para que o senhor Garrison no perca o seu trabalho como professor. Os meninos se juntam com Tweek, que sugere um novo tema para a redao: "Gnomos que roubam cuecas".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan e kyle descobrem um homem que estava preso no gelo h mais de trs anos, mas acabam brigando para ver quem o descobriu e qusl nome dar para ele.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Vrios habitantes de South Park esto ficando cada vez mais furiosos, e sem alguma razo aparente. Randy o principal responsvel para descobrir uma soluo para este problema. Enquanto isso, Kyle tenta "conseguir uma ereo".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Chef tem uma namorada nova e ao que parece, uma relao sria. Agora os rapazes esto preocupados com isso. Enquanto isso, Cartman est com problemas nos olhos e odeia ter que ir ao seu oculista, que o chama de "porquinho".
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman, Kyle e Stan enganam Tweek e Craig para que eles lutem um contra o outro. Enquanto isso, um dos professores est sendo atormentado por uma recordao de sua falecida namorada, e Kenny conquista um homem rico na aula de cozinha.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman descobre uma criatura em extino durante um acampamento. No incio, todos acham legal, mas em seguida, todos se do conta que na verdade esta criatura, na verdade, um animal pr-histrico extremamente chato.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A senhora Cartman vai para uma festa e deixa o seu filho sob os cuidados de Shelley. Agora, Cartman est preso em sua casa e precisa lidar com os abusos de Shelley, seu namorado de 22 anos e sua gata que est no cio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Stan tem que ir com os seus pais para uma festa chata repleta dos alunos menos populares do colgio, como Butters, Pip e Dougie. Enquanto isso, Randy e Gerald passam por uma situao um tanto quanto incmoda em uma jacuzzi.

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O Cachorro que Salvou o Vero, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que seu cachorro Zeus estraga uma festa, George o leva para uma escola de obedincia dirigida por um peculiar instrutor. Porm, o co consegue falhar em todos os testes, e ele procura a ajuda de um treinador com tcnicas especiais.

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Ruslan, um artista sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, se apaixona por Mila. A felicidade deles no dura muito tempo. Chernomor, o malvado feiticeiro, rouba Mila diante dos olhos de Ruslan para transformar seu poder de amor em seu prprio poder mgico.

programme.title: O Reino Gelado 3 - Fogo e Gelo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O raro talento de se meter em problemas o legado da famlia de Kai e Gerda. Crescidos, os irmos se metem em um desastre de propores globais, tudo para encontrar seus pais que esto desaparecidos aps serem levados pelo Vento do Norte.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Chester e Colette decidem fazer uma viagem de barco Grcia. No local, eles conhecem Rydal, um guia americano que fala grego e decide ajud-los. O que eles no sabem que Rydal conhecido por aplicar golpes nos turistas.

programme.title: Meu Querido Elfo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma me solteira compra um apartamento antigo, sem saber que uma criatura mtica, um elfo, vive no apartamento h sculos. Os novos donos da casa precisam fazer amizade com a criatura, cuja tarefa justamente proteger o local de uma bruxa.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A violncia do preconceito racial causa um boicote aos transportes por parte da comunidade negra nos anos 1950. Uma aristocrata decide, por convenincia, ajudar sua empregada, mas seu marido a probe. Essa imposio faz com que as duas se unam.

programme.title: Caf com Amor, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Claire trabalha em um charmoso caf. Com palavras de sabedoria, ela ajuda e conforta diferentes tipos de clientes com seus conselhos sobre questes pessoais. Porm, um grande acontecimento est prestes a mudar a vida de todos os clientes do lugar.

programme.title: Submisso, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Dois fuzileiros voltam para casa depois de passarem por inmeros traumas no confronto com Estado Islmico. Eles buscam um novo caminho e, enquanto um tenta se recuperar de um vcio, o outro reencontra o MMA.

programme.title: Preciso Ser Pai, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Jonah um jovem playboy que no liga para muitas coisas na vida. Aps um encontro conturbado com Becky, ele descobre que tem cncer e pode ficar infrtil. Agora, a nica preocupao de Jonah ter um filho antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos se surpreendem com a coleo Duel Monsters de seu av. Porm, quando Kaiba, o duelista no 1 lugar e magnata cruel, rapta seu av, atrs da carta rara Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis, Yugi o encara num confronto sem igual de Duel Monsters!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos do uma pausa no aperfeioamento de suas habilidades no jogo de cartas para assistir ao confronto de Weevil e Rex Raptor no Campeonato Regional de Duel Monsters.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi cede uma de suas estrelas para que Joey embarque no navio com destino ao Reino dos Duelistas e duele para salvar a viso de sua irm, enquanto Ta e Tristan embarcam como clandestinos para acompanhar seus amigos.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Quando Yugi e seus amigos chegam ao Reino dos Duelistas, Pegasus revela que h muitos segredos estranhos na ilha, os quais tornaro seu grande torneio diferente de qualquer outro que eles j tiveram.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Depois de derrotar a primeira leva de Monstros de Duelo de Weevil, Yugi fica chocado ao descobrir que Weevil tem um ltimo truque debaixo da manga, uma Grande Mariposa voraz que aumenta seu poder a cada turno.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Enquanto Joey procura um duelista oponente que ele possa derrotar, ele se v corajosamente aceitando um desafio do duelista veterano Mai.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: O duelista pescador, o mestre do Deck do Mar, atrai Yugi para um duelo em seu prprio campo de jogo, o mar, tendo a vantagem da casa. Ser que Yugi vai se adaptar ao novo ambiente e virar a mar ao seu favor?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Se Yugi for eliminado do torneio, a junta de diretores corrupta da KaibaCorp transferir o controle da companhia de Kaiba para Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi deve duelar contra o fantasma de Kaiba, criado pela ganncia e cobia pelo poder que Yugi extirpou da alma de Kaiba. Sem suas melhores cartas, Yugi precisa de uma nova estratgia para sobreviver ao Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do Kaiba impostor.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi derrota o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis, mas h mais dois esperando nas asas! Ser que o Kaiba verdadeiro alcanar Yugi a tempo de ajud-lo a derrotar esse impostor?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey decide batalhar contra Rex Raptor sem a ajuda de seus amigos para provar que homem bastante para cuidar de Serenity sozinho.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey duela com bravura, mas Rex Raptor liberou sua arma secreta: o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos! Joey precisa descobrir o segredo do presente de Yugi, a carta Mago do Tempo, sem a ajuda de Yugi, ou partir do Reino dos Duelistas no prximo navio.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Bakura, um colega de turma de Yugi, possudo pelos poderes escuros de seu Anel do Milnio, prende Yugi e seus amigos em um Jogo das Sombras no qual eles se tornam as prprias cartas!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: PaniK, o duelista de Pegasus, trapaceia e ganha todas as estrelas de Mai. Yugi jura derrot-lo e recuper-las. Porm, o Castelo de Iluses Escuras de PaniK envolve seus monstros numa nvoa escura. Como Yugi derrotar um inimigo que ele no pode ver?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.sub-title: A Luz no Fim do Tnel

programme.title: Apesar de sua surpreendente desvantagem, Yugi provoca PaniK destemidamente: Vou acabar com voc em trs turnos. Yugi est blefando ou tem a vantagem nesta batalha de inteligncia?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba desce at o reino para enfrentar Pegasus! Ser que Kaiba mudou aps sua batalha com Yugi ou ainda o mesmo duelista impiedoso? A resposta jaz numa batalha entre o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis de Kaiba e o Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos de Joey!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A gangue do duelista americano n 1, Bandit Keith, sequestra Joey para uma caverna secreta com um cemitrio como campo de jogo. Enquanto Yugi e seus amigos procuram por ele, Joey enfrenta monstros zumbis que ficam mais forte ao sarem de seus tmulos!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A ltima tentativa de Joey, sua carta da sorte Mago do Tempo, fracassa contra os monstros zumbis de Bandit Keith. Ao passo que sua mar de sorte acaba, ser que suas habilidades melhoradas e amor por sua irm o inspiraro para a vitria?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Presos na caverna labirinto, Yugi e seus amigos encontram uma sada alternativa, mas a porta vigiada pelos Irmos Paradoxo, irmos de Pegasus.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey combinam foras e se defendem dos monstros de seus oponentes, mas as coisas logo mudaro, j que os Irmos Paradoxo invocam o todo-poderoso Guardio do Porto, um monstro que reflete qualquer ataque!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e Joey liberam cada um o seu monstro mais forte, Caveira Invocada e Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos, mas a fora deles perde a imponncia, comparada ao tremendo poder do Guardio do Porto.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Usando a mgica do Olho do Milnio, Pegasus prende a alma de Mokuba dentro de uma carta bem na frente de Kaiba! Para conseguir o direito de desafiar Pegasus, Kaiba precisa derrotar Yugi e pegar suas estrelas primeiro.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba invoca Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, o monstro mais forte do jogo, a fuso de trs Drages Brancos de Olhos Azuis! Yugi perdeu seus poderosos Monstros de Duelo, mas um duelista verdadeiro nunca desiste!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi comea a tecer uma estratgia para destruir o Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis, mas tem que decidir se vai clamar vitria ou poupar a vida de Kaiba. O corao de Yugi est dividido.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Tendo perdido suas estrelas para Kaiba, assim como sua nica chance de salvar seu av, Yugi est em estado de choque. Ser que Ta pode fazer Yugi recobrar os sentidos ganhando as estrelas de Mai, ensinando o corao do duelista a Yugi?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos entram no castelo e veem que Kaiba est pronto para duelar contra Pegasus, e a alma de Mokuba continua com um futuro incerto! O poder do Olho do Milnio d a Pegasus a habilidade de ler a mente das pessoas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Kaiba impotente diante do deck Mundo Toon de Pegasus e de sua habilidade de ler mentes. Quando o duelo acaba, Pegasus prende a alma de Kaiba em uma carta, como com o av de Yugi e Mokuba! Yugi est farto!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: O Genesis rompeu com o evoludo Mugen The Hand, e assume a liderana mais uma vez. Irritado com a observao de Seijirou de que Raimon o mesmo que Gnesis, Endou tenta furiosamente provar que ele est errado.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Raimon finalmente derrotou Gnesis e abre os olhos de Seijirou. Mas, no final, qual foi a verdadeira razo pela qual a Aliea Academy comeou.
programme.desc: Super Onze
programme.sub-title: O Raimon vs. Raimon se enfrentam

programme.title: O Raimon Eleven retorna Raimon Junior High apenas para encontrar Ryichi Kenzaki esperando por eles l, junto com os antigos membros de Raimon que deixaram a equipe devido a ferimentos.
programme.desc: Super Onze

programme.title: Mesmo tendo perdido 2 pontos no primeiro tempo, Raimon nunca desiste e recupera 2 pontos no segundo tempo. No entanto, as coisas pioram quando os Imperadores das Trevas comeam a atacar violentamente.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7, (2020, Action)

programme.title: Fim da Linha, (2016, Drama)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kazekage Se Mantm No Alto

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Crescimento De Naruto

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Me
programme.desc: A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magntico.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage

programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Ten Seconds to Hell, (1959, War)
programme.desc: In this gritty WW II classic from director Robert Aldrich, Jeff Chandler and Jack Palance star as demolition experts who return to bombed-out Berlin to accept the very dangerous job of defusing unexploded bombs scattered throughout the city.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let's Go Hunting!

programme.desc: Brandon Ma is an average Joe, but his best friend, Michael, is a sinister drug dealer with a crush on Brandon's girlfriend, May. When Michael murders a dirty cop and frames his friend, sending him to jail, Brandon returns for vengeance.

programme.desc: Sean Thompson and Billie Blake are a part of the L.A.P.D.'s new program called 'Martial Law'. When they begin to tangle with criminal and kung fu master Dalton Rhodes, it becomes personal...

programme.title: Martial Law II: Undercover, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Two undercover cops investigating a murder uncover a deadly ring of corruption at a nightclub where the rich are entertained by seductive women and protected by martial arts experts.

programme.title: Honor and Glory, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: FBI agent Tracy Pride is on a mission to capture businessman Jason Slade, who is involved in extortion and murder. Teaming up with her is her sister Joyce, a news reporter; Dragon, Tracy's partner in Hong Kong, and Jake, a bodyguard who worked for Slade.

programme.title: Sworn to Justice, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: After attackers kill her sister and nephew, a female psychologist becomes a defense witness by day and avenger by night.

programme.title: Lady Bloodfight, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Upon arriving in Hong Kong, an American woman is beaten up and mugged by thugs. She's taken in by a martial arts master who trains her for a formidable fight competition known as the Kumite.

programme.title: Drive, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: When a prototype 'enhanced human' on the run from hit men hooks up with a dread-locked bystander, the two elude their pursuers. Starring Brittany Murphy ("8 Mile").

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves makes his directorial debut in this explosive martial arts drama that reunites him with legendary Matrix Trilogy fight choreographer Yuen Wo Ping and stuntman Tiger Chen.

programme.title: Tekken, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: The year is 2039. The world wars have destroyed everything and territories are run by corporations, the mightiest of which is TEKKEN. In the midst of the ruined society, one warrior rises from the streets.

programme.title: The Cable Guy, (1996, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Out-of-control comedy features Jim Carrey at his hilarious best as a hard-wired cable installer just looking for a friend. Matthew Broderick co-stars.

programme.title: Who's Harry Crumb?, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: John Candy is bigger, better and more bumbling than ever as a soft-headed private eye determined to crack a kidnapping case.

programme.title: High School High, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: From the creators of the Naked Gun series comes High School High. Richard C. Clark is an idealisticyoung teacher who leaves a position at a prestigious school headed by his own father to teach at Marion Barry High.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ace Ventura Pet Detective is on the case to find the Miami Dolphins' missing mascot and quarterback Dan Marino. He goes eye to eye with sharks, stakes out the Miami Dolphins and woos and wows the ladies. He always gets his man...or beast.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Africa's the place where Ace is on the case, setting out to rescue an animal he loathes - a bat! If you're ready to laugh like a pack of hyenas, if you want more fun than an industrial-sized barrel of monkeys, you'll know what to do. Heed the call.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: Daddy Day Care, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

programme.title: Death at a Funeral, (2010, Comedy)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men, (1993, Screwball)

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Action and romance take to the screen when a self-centered ex-hockey star (D.B. Sweeney) and a prima donna champion figure skater (Moira Kelly) become unlikely partners in pursuit of Olympic gold.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Adapted from William Shakespeare, the film tells the story of two couples, confirmed bachelor Benedick and caustic Beatrice, and young Claudio and innocent Hero. Playful bickering defines one couple, whereas romance and betrayal describe the other.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Yentl, (1983, Musical)
programme.desc: Barbra Streisand stars in this beautifully portrayed story of a young independent woman who is forced to masquerade as a boy in order to pursue her love of knowledge.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: Grease, (1978, Musical)
programme.desc: Grease is the one that you want! Go back to high school with Pink Lady Sandy (Olivia Newton-John), leader of the bad-boy T-Birds, Danny (John Travolta), and a rockin' and rollin' all-star cast.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza, (1988, Romance)
programme.desc: The coming-of-age of three best friends who work at a pizzeria in the seaside town of Mystic, Connecticut.

programme.title: The Vanished, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: A family vacation takes a terrifying turn when a couple's young daughter disappears without a trace. As the list of suspects grows, the search for the truth leads to a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Valkyrie, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: In WWII, a group of German officers plots to assassinate Hitler and seize control of the military command to end the war. The operation was codenamed "Valkyrie", for the plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: No Way Out, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: A morally upright naval hero accepts a position with the Secretary of Defense and his somewhat overzealous assistant. Things become a bit sticky when the Secretary of Defense becomes involved in the murder of a beautiful Washington, D.C. party girl.

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: Pacific Heights, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: A couple work hard to renovate their dream house and become landlords to pay for it. Unfortunately, one of their tenants has plans of his own.

programme.title: Revolver, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: REVOLVER is populated with Guy Ritchie's (Snatch; Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels) classic breed of fast-talking, sharp-suited gangsters but with a psychological twist that your mind may not be able to handle.

programme.title: Lakeview Terrace, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: A young interracial couple move into their dream home and are increasingly harassed by their next-door neighbor, a tightly wound black LAPD officer. When the couple decides to fight back the feud turns deadly.

programme.title: Indecent Proposal, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Demi Moore and Woody Harrelson are Diana and David Murphy, a financially strapped couple who are betting on a quick trip to Las Vegas to deal them a lucky hand. But the odds are suddenly even more attractive when billionaire John Gage ups the ante.

programme.title: Glengarry Glen Ross, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: A group of Chicago real-estate salesmen and con artists live on the edge.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Flags Of Our Fathers, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: RAGING BULL is director Martin Scorsese's lacerating film biography of middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta, who was known during his brief reign as "the Bronx Bull."

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Big Fish, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Throughout his life, Edward Bloom (Ewan McGregor) has always been a man of big appetites, enormous passions and tall tales.

programme.title: Punch-Drunk Love, (2002, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Barry Egan (Adam Sandler) is a small business owner with seven sisters whose abuse has kept him alone and unable to fall in love. When a harmonium and a mysterious woman (Emily Watson) enter his life, his romantic journey begins.

programme.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly, (1967, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood portrays the invincible 'Man With No Name' in lethal pursuit of $200,000 in Confederate money alongside Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach in this renowned, influential, and classic cinematic western directed by the great Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: A Man Called Horse, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars as Lord John Morgan, captured by the Sioux in early 19th century America. After Morgan embraces the tribe's way of life, he faces the intense and painful Sun Vow ritual to test his dedication and commitment.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Alex Rider: Operation Stormbreaker, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: After his uncle dies, a young boy learns of his relative's true occupation as an undercover spy and is later recruited to be undercover himself. Based on the novel by Anthony Horowitz.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Noah, (2014, Action)

programme.title: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.

programme.title: Luffy and his new companion Coby set sail in search of the infamous pirate hunter Zoro, rumored to be held captive at the Marine Base.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the Great Swordsman! Pirate Hunter Roronoa Zoro!

programme.title: Luffy is in the line of fire after saving Zoro, and now tyrannical Captain Morgan is out for their heads! Zoro must decide if he will join forces with Luffy or die in captivity.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Morgan versus Luffy! Who's the Mysterious Pretty Girl?

programme.title: Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy crosses paths with the clever thief Nami. A navigator on a quest to collect one hundred million berries, shes perfect for Luffys new crew except for the fact that Nami hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Terrifying Mysterious Power! Captain Buggy, the Clown Pirate!

programme.title: Having delivered a deadly blow to Captain Buggys pirates, Luffy and his companions need a place to recuperate. But the three are not in hiding very long before the Beast Tamer Mohji seeks them out.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!

programme.title: In the ongoing fight with Captain Buggys pirates, Zoro must face off with the Acrobat Cabaji while Luffy continues to do battle with the Pirate Clown himself.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic Showdown! Swordsman Zoro vs. Acrobat Cabaji!

programme.title: Luffy and the gang are on the run after the battle with Captain Buggy! With no place to go and nothing else to do, Nami finally agrees to join Luffy on his quest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Who is the Victor? Devil Fruit Power Showdown!

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Nami arrive at an island hoping to obtain a ship and crew, but the three are quickly confronted with the blustering Captain Usopp who has a connection to Luffys past.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy follows Usopp to the mansion and encounters the brutal pirate Captain Kuro. The scoundrel plans to claim Kayas fortune and live the stolen life of luxury.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Weirdest Guy Ever! Jango the Hypnotist!

programme.title: Usopp spreads the word of Kuros evil plot and the impending pirate attack, but no one believes his warnings. The Straw Hat Pirates decide to help Usopp put a stop to the dastardly scheme.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Expose the Plot! Pirate Butler, Captain Kuro!

programme.title: Luffy and crew seek to best Captain Kuro, but theyve prepared their defense on the wrong side of the island! All looks grim now that Usopp must face off against the Black Cat Pirates alone.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Clash with the Black Cat Pirates! The Great Battle on the Slope!

programme.title: In an effort to save Usopps village, the Straw Hat Pirates seek to block the marauders path from the sea. With Luffy out of the battle, Zoro must face the fearsome Meowban Brothers!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Terrifying Duo! Meowban Brothers vs. Zoro!

programme.title: Nami manages to rescue Zoros missing swords and attempts to revive Luffy. With one of the Meowban brothers down, the other rages on even more fiercely than before!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Back in Action! Miss Kaya's Desperate Resistance!

programme.title: Usopps friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man's Tearful Resolve!

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'tat is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: In this thrilling cult classic, two dangerous outlaw brothers head out on a wild crime spree. After kidnapping a father and his two kids, the bad guys head to a seedy Mexican bar for safety but come face to face with blood-sucking vampires.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.desc: When a gang of bank robbers makes a run for the border, they wander into the wrong bar and mess with the wrong vampires. It's kill-or-be-killed in the ultimate battle to stop these evil creatures and save their own lives!

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn 3: Hangman's Daughter, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: Set in Mexico in the early 1900s, this prequel to the From Dusk Till Dawn series finds outlaw Johnny Madrid on the run from the hangman, with the hangman's daughter Esmeralda by his side. Together they are faced with the fight of their lives.

programme.title: Pixels, (2015, Comedy)
programme.desc: Former best friends must join forces and take the battle from the consoles to the streets when an army of aliens attacks Earth with massive video game characters.

programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: John Sturges' The Hallelujah Trail, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Chaos reigns on the wide open plains as a host of stars, including Burt Lancaster and Lee Remick, have their eyes set on a shipment of whiskey and let loose in this wild comedy that spoofs nearly every convention of movie westerns.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Drama)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: Ghost World, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.

programme.title: Saved!, (2004, Drama)
programme.desc: Good girl Mary (Jena Malone) can't believe it when she gets pregnant by her newly-gay boyfriend. She also can't believe the actions of her popular, relentlessly devout best friend, Hilary Faye (Mandy Moore).

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: Sara is a small-town girl who dreams to become a world-class ballerina. But when her mother suddenly dies, she must abandon her plans and join her estranged father on Chicago's South Side.

programme.title: Freedom Writers, (2007, Drama)
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this story about a teacher in a racially divided school who gives her students what theyve always needed - a voice.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: Save The Last Dance, (2001, Drama)

The Legion's large-scale offensive begins, and the Spearhead crew are sent into the thick of the fighting, but even back at base, there's no safety to be found.

In the Republic, Lena organizes a desperate last stand against the invading Legion; in the Federacy, Shin, his friends, and Frederica manage to survive the bombardment, but the Legion inflicts significant losses.

As the Nachzehrer nears the Morpho, it comes under anti-air attack; Nordlicht fights its way through the Legion defenders and approaches the Morpho, only for Shin to realize that the damaged Morpho is bait for a trap.
Deep in enemy territory, with supplies running low and damage piling up, Nordlicht makes a final desperate march towards Morpho.

programme.title: O Legionrio
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: A Perseguio
programme.desc: Ottway trabalha em um lugar isolado no Alasca. Certo dia, quando retornava cidade para matar a saudade da esposa, o avio cai. Feridos e sem alimentos, os sobreviventes lutam pela vida e tentam reencontrar a civilizao.

programme.title: O Homem da Mfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da mfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitao de alguns dos participantes coloca a situao fora de controle.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agncia de Proteo Ambiental da Ucrnia, de Marselha a Odessa, alm de dois sacos de contedo suspeito.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Fuga alucinante
programme.desc: Com uma bomba-relgio pendurada no pescoo, um jovem corre contra o relgio e todos os tipos de inimigos enquanto vai de um lado a outro da cidade na tentativa de salvar a si mesmo e sua namorada.

programme.title: O Homem mais Procurado do Mundo
programme.desc: Em maio de 2011, uma equipe experiente de SEALS da Marinha dos EUA chega a uma fortaleza do Paquisto e termina a caa ao terrorista mais procurado do mundo.

programme.title: Wasabi
programme.desc: Um duro detetive francs, chamado ao Japo para o funeral da esposa que o deixou h muito tempo atrs, descobre que tem uma filha adolescente cuja vida corre perigo, estando na mira da Yakuza.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Renegados
programme.desc: Quatro veteranos de combate so obrigados a voltar ao quando um deles brutalmente assassinado por uma gangue internacional. Unidos pela dor e pela fria, eles embarcam em uma misso de vingana pelas ruas cruis de Londres.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Blitz um serial killer de Londres que est matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polcia duro, inflexvel e politicamente incorreto, tero a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 5
programme.desc: No quinto captulo da franquia Jogos Mortais, o Detetive Hoffman parece ser a ltima pessoa viva a continuar o legado do Jigsaw. Mas quando o seu segredo ameaado, Hoffman precisa ir caa para eliminar todos os assuntos inacabados.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 6

programme.title: Ningum Ama Ningum Por Mais de Dois Anos
programme.desc: Com uma narrativa bem-humorada, o filme mostra a histria de cinco casais que vivem, paralelamente, no incio da dcada de 60 no Brasil.

programme.title: Muita Calma Nessa Hora
programme.desc: Tita, Mari e Aninha so amigas que enfrentam momentos de deciso em suas vidas. Decididas a relaxar, elas partem para curtir um fim de semana em Bzios.

programme.title: O Dirio de Tati
programme.desc: A adolescente Tati conta, de forma divertida, todos os problemas de sua juventude ao seu dirio. Desde ficar em recuperao em matemtica at os esforos para conseguir fisgar Zeca, sua paixo atual.

programme.title: Armadas e Perigosas

programme.title: Legado de Violncia
programme.desc: Quando seu filho envolvido com negcios perigosos e pessoas de mau carter foge, um pai se v em meio a uma crise pessoal e familiar.

programme.desc: Enquanto caminhava para casa depois de uma consulta obsttrica, Esther brutalmente atacada e desfigurada por um agressor encapuzado.

programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell est se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada at que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: O Trem-Bala
programme.desc: Uma bomba colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rpido do mundo e explodir caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.desc: Alex Lainey uma estudante do ensino mdio que comea a desenvolver estranhas habilidades aps se deparar com luzes misteriosas. Com a ajuda de seu amigo de infncia, Sean Terrel, Alex precisa fugir de uma organizao secreta do governo.

programme.title: No Feche os Olhos - S1E0
